info-des: helps you to buy the dip while making
info-des-tow: A smart vault helps you to buy the dip while making
how-it-works-des: Assuming ETH price is now $1200, Alice wants to buy the dip if it drops to $1000.
no-dip-hunter-des: Place limit orders on Binance at $1000, then wait for the order to fill.
scenario-a-des: ETH Price rise to $1800. Alice’s order didn’t fill.
scenario-b-des: ETH Price drops to $900 and Alice’s order was filled at $1000. She now has 1ETH at hand.
with-dip-hunter-des-two: on Deri Protocol, collect funding payment as long as the position holds.
with-dip-hunter-secenario-a-des: Alice won’t be able to buy ETH at $1000, but the everlasting options position is generating a daily income for Alice all the time.
with-dip-hunter-scenario-a-the: The total income is calculated as
with-dip-hunter-scenario-a-the-volume: Volume * (Entry Price - Exit Price) + Avg. Daily Funding * Holding Period = $78.55
with-dip-hunter-secenario-b-des: Thanks to the continuous daily income, Alice will probably be able to buy more than 1 ETH with her account balance.
with-dip-hunter-scenario-b-the: The net loss is calculated as
with-dip-hunter-scenario-b-the-volume: Volume * (Entry Price - Exit Price) + Avg. Daily Funding * Holding Period = -$94.22
with-dip-hunter-scenario-b-alice: Alice has an initial deposit of $1000. Now the account balance is $912. she can buy 1.1ETH, which is 0.1ETH more than Option One.
